title: Duke, Please Repent! - Novel Updates
tags: Aristocracy   Butlers   Caring Protagonist   Child Abuse   Comedic Undertone   Demon Lord   Demons   Dwarfs   Elves   Empires   Gods   Handsome Male Lead   Heroes   Kingdoms   Male Protagonist   Monsters   Nobles   Possession   Priestesses   Priests   Secret Identity   Secret Organizations   Servants   Sword And Magic   Tragic Past   Transmigration   Transplanted Memories   Transported to Another World
author: 별볆볆별명
description:
He became an aide to the final boss in the novel.

In the ending of the novel, the final boss is dead, and the world is already in tatters.

So why don’t we get the final boss off the hook in the first place?

We can’t fix people, but there’s no other option, so let’s try fixing the boss.>
